replies.message: No amount is too small, Zeeta! We're glad you could help contribute to the cause. -Sarah

So I just reported a page for graphic content, and Facebook says it doesn't violate their standards. This page is for dog fighting which is highly illegal, it is filled with videos of dogs dying and being killed by other dogs. I want you to explain to me how that doesn't violate your standards. https://www.facebook.com/.../Pitbull.../366115430207371
